Valder Roberval Arruda

  • Endereço para acessar este CV: http://lattes.cnpq.br/1706206665225855
  • Última atualização do currículo em 30/06/2015

Possui graduação em Medicina pela Universidade Federal do Triângulo Mineiro (1987) e doutorado em Ciências Médicas pela Universidade Estadual de Campinas (1995). , atuando principalmente nos seguintes temas: myelodysplasia, hemofilia, leucemia, teleangiectsia hemorragica hereditaria e b-thalassemia. Atualmente é professor Associado em Pediatria , na escola de Medicina Parelman, Universidade da Pensilvânia e Pesquisador no "The Children`s Hospital of Philadelphia". (Texto informado pelo autor)

Outras informações
Dr. Arruda has been a full-time member of the Division of Hematology at The Children?s Hospital of Philadelphia since 1997. He join us as a Post-Doctoral Fellow and in 2000 was appointed as Faculty of the University of Pennsylvania Medical School and became an Associate Professor of Pediatrics at the University of Pennsylvania with Tenure since 2007. Dr. Arruda has many ongoing hospital and administrative appointments: He is a lecturer for University graduate courses, and is a member of the Admissions Committee for MD, PhD Students at the University of Pennsylvania School of Medicine. He has trained several post-doctoral fellows, graduate students and pre-med students over the last decades while at The Children's Hospital of Philadelphia/University of Pennsylvania.


Universidade Estadual de Campinas, UNICAMP, Brasil.
